title: Chapter 2162 - Chapter 2162: Rao Wangze, You’Re Too Arrogant! (3)
body:
Chapter 2162 - Chapter 2162: Rao Wangze, You’Re Too Arrogant! (3)

Chapter 2162: Rao Wangze, You’re Too Arrogant! (3)

Translator: Nyoi-Bo Studio Editor: Nyoi-Bo Studio

One had to stabilize their own demi-saint realm before contending with the Holy Emperor’s power.

Now, if one wished to deal with the Wangze Holy Emperor, it would not be possible without paying a price.

However, the Water Ghost was a cunning egoist.

He could not accept the slightest damage to his perfect foundational roots in the confrontation with the Holy Emperor’s Clone of Will.

He could only help Xu Xiaoshou endure the force for a moment, extending his

utmost benevolence…”

“Run!”

As the power of the Holy Emperor exploded, the Water Ghost instantly merged into the Holy Path, reappearing high above the First Hall of Sins.

If the Upanishad demi-saint wanted to run, not even the pressure from the Holy Emperor could restrain him.

Within the Holy Path, the Water Ghost coalesced and ushered in a rebirth, even taking the time to greet Dao Qiongcang and Rao Yaoyao, who were not far

away.

“Observing the battle? Quite leisurely!”

This sarcastic remark chilled Rao Yaoyao’s pretty face, fueling her anger.

With a smile, Water Ghost disappeared again, only to reappear inside the unguarded Rao Yaoyao, merging into her body.

Rao Yaoyao’s face changed drastically; she had fallen for such a simple provocation!

The power of the two God’s Blessings could still continue here!

Rao Yaoyao swore that she would never take someone else’s elixirs for the rest of her life, even if it meant death!

Azure Finger, disregarding spacetime, pointed from the Desolate Inferno Domain towards the First Hall of Sins, causing panic among the spectators below.

“Do you dare to kill me?” Water Ghost appeared behind Rao Yaoyao, condensed into a blurry upper body, and sneered, “Do you dare to let Rao Yaoyao die with

Wangze Holy Emperor did not respond.

Azure Finger remained unmoved.

Rao Yaoyao never expected the calamity to strike so abruptly. Her Holy Emperor Rao showed no hint of hesitation, willing to eliminate her! As the fingertip approached, Dao Qiongcang’s Divine Sinan moved.

“Great Stripping Technique.”

However, Water Ghost was prepared, almost simultaneously deploying the

“Secondary Plane Door!”

This supreme treasure opened above Dao Qiongcang’s head, drawing upon the Sealing Power of the Inner Island, briefly sealing his attack.

The situation fell into chaos.

Everyone tried to outsmart each other, and Azure Finger seemed poised to kill Rao Yaoyao and Water Ghost. Dao Qiongcang’s hand moved again. “Enough!”

A loud shout erupted in the sky.

Accompanied by the angry voice, the Heavenly Ancestor Light descended, piercing Azure Finger and quickly wiping it out. All eyes turned to the source of the sound in shock.

It was Xu Xiaoshou’s voice!

Hovering above the Desolate Inferno Domain, Xu Xiaoshou transformed into Holy Light, his fully unleashed aura radiating.

He surpassed everyone’s expectations, completed the acceptance of power, regained his sanity, and joined the battle.

“Rao Wangze, you are too arrogant. How dare you even think of testing my power?” After stepping out of the Holy Light, Xu Xiaoshou stared directly at the distant figure.

Without a doubt, Rao Wangze relentlessly pursued Water Ghost, completely ignoring Xu Xiaoshou, who had inherited the power.

This was nothing short of sheer arrogance!

Xu Xiaoshou knew his intentions.

He just wanted to see how far he could go and whether he could obliterate his thought incarnation.

However, after completing the power acceptance, Xu Xiaoshou understood the terror of Bazhun’an’s move.

Whether Rao Wangze was genuinely confident or overly arrogant, Xu Xiaoshou could not tell.

But…

“Since you want to try, then go ahead!”

Looking at the blurred face, and reading the ambiguous expression, Xu Xiaoshou felt insulted.

“Ridiculed, Passive Points +1.”

He was really being mocked!

Xu Xiaoshou was furious. Standing in the Si Wu Formation, he connected his spiritual senses to the cooled Dark Iron Sword on the Fallen Abyss.

He had understood everything.

Water Ghost communicated with Abyss Island using the array wheel given by Patriarch Wuji.

To connect with the Inner Island and borrow the power of the Holy Emperor inside, one had to use the array wheel from Bazhun’an. And Bazhun’an’s array wheel was the long-forgotten sword.

“Si Wu Formation, dissolve!”

With a shout, the three hundred and sixty-five Void Suppression Steles and Nine Cores of Abyss Island, including Xu Xiaoshou himself, shifted positions.

The sword on the Fallen Abyss emitted a bright light.

“Boom…”

The Order of the Great Path emerged in the world, and the Inner Island was presented as a mirror. Countless ghost beasts that were once intangible became tangible.

The path to the Inner Island seemed to be opening!

However, at this moment, Rao Wangze’s expression became more concrete and more playful.

He finally spoke directly, lightly laughing at Xu Xiaoshou, “Did you really think you could unravel the Si Wu Formation?”

Snap.

Before Xu Xiaoshou could infuse all his power into the cooling Dark Iron Sword, a strong wind pressure gathered.

The sword thrown down by Bazhun’an was blasted into nothingness.

In that instant, Abyss Island seemed to fall silent.

Xu Xiaoshou’s expression also froze.

“Heh.” On the ruins of the First Hall of Sins, Dao Qiongcang’s lips curled up slightly, but he suppressed it.

People had forgotten this sword, but when Dao Qiongcang was hit, he remembered it.

During the chaotic battle, Dao Qiongcang, who had already seen the core array eye, surreptitiously informed Rao Wangze of this information.

This move cut off all transformation in Xu Xiaoshou.

“Bazhun’an, what are you thinking?” Dao Qiongcang smiled and glanced at the figure outside the Forest of Miracles. However, he saw that the person remained calm, and his brows furrowed.

He immediately sensed that something was amiss and, pinching his fingers hidden in his sleeve, his expression slightly stiffened.

“Sizzle…”

On the Desolate Inferno Domain, Xu Xiaoshou’s actions only paused for a moment, and a surging aura emanated from his Yuan Mansion.

Wait, Yuan Mansion?

“Startled, Passive Points +1..”
